attributes.review: App caused my phone too slow down and it caused my phone too shutdown too frequently after I removed the app from my phone my phone started performing better

attributes.review: This app is poisonous! My whole family is now dead. I am homeless. I got nuclear bombed after downloading this app. Also what’s with the obnoxious orange face always popping up when I try to use this app??

attributes.review: i genuinely can not believe that we live in a country with such an idiotic president. i am so excited to turn 18 so i can vote. sadly i’ll never be able to vote this dumb orange out of office but see him leave will put a HUGE smile on my face❤️
attributes.title: any respectable person 2020

There is a massive bug on this app. I was just opening it and it supports Trump?!?!? I was absolutely appalled when I saw this. There should be some kind of warning that a virus got into the app and is supporting a racist. Disgusting 
0/10 would not recommend

This took forever to download it took 3 hours and after it finish downloading the app caused my phone to glitch and took up all my phone’s storage worst app ever don’t get this if you don’t want to lose brain cells

attributes.review: When ever I downloaded the app my phone started to crash and totally shut down, it also took 2 days for it to download and took up so much space. I don’t recommend this app at all!
